article:
{{Infobox Doctor Who episode| |number=155 From the [[Doctor Who
Magazine]] series overview, in issue 407 (pp26-29). [[The Discontinuity Guide]],
which counts the four segments of [[The Trial of a Time Lord]] as four separate
stories and also counts the unbroadcast serial [[Shada]], lists this story as
number 159. Region 1 DVD releases follow The Discontinuity Guide numbering
system. |serial_name= Survival |image= |caption=Karra and Ace on
the cheetah planet. |show=DW |type=serial |doctor=Sylvester McCoy (Seventh
Doctor) |companion=Sophie Aldred (Ace) |guests=
* Anthony Ainley â The Master
* Lisa Bowerman â Karra
* Julian Holloway â Paterson
* David John â Derek
* Will Barton â Midge
* Sean Oliver â Stuart
* Sakuntala Ramanee â Shreela
* Gareth Hale â Len
* Norman Pace â Harvey
* Kate Eaton â Ange

* Adele Silva â Squeak
* Michelle Martin â Neighbour |writer=Rona Munro |director=Alan Wareing
  |script_editor=Andrew Cartmel |producer=John Nathan-Turner
  |executive_producer=None |production_code=7P |series=Season 26 |length=3
  episodes, 25 minutes each |date=22 November–6 December 1989
  |preceding=[[The Curse of Fenric]] |following=[[Doctor Who (film)|Doctor
  Who]] (TV movie) [[Dimensions in Time]] (special) }} 'Survival' is the
  fourth and final serial of the 26th season in the British science fiction
  television series [[Doctor Who]], which was first broadcast in three parts,
  weekly, from 22 November to 6 December 1989. It was the final story of the
  original 26-year run of the series to be transmitted on BBC One, marking the
  final regular television appearance of Anthony Ainley as the Master and of
  Sophie Aldred as Ace.
categories: Doctor Who stories set on Earth
